title:
Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site
: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Groups of 10 or more are encouraged to make reservations by calling 202-673-2402. For special event or special use permits (i.e. filming or professional photography) please visit the National Mall and Memorial Parks Permits Office page.
